title: How do I get the latest GeForce Control Panel? | NVIDIA
text: How do I get the latest GeForce Control Panel? Updated 02/28/2022 11:35 AM The NVIDIA GeForce Control Panel is included in the GeForce driver. Click here to find the latest driver for your GeForce graphics card. https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/drivers/ Is this answer helpful? Yes No Answers others found helpful NVIDIA Control Panel Windows Store App Identifying the Graphics Card Model and Device ID in a PC How do I determine which NVIDIA display driver version is currently installed on my PC?
